page.title: 19LIFE STYLES
page.content: NICKY BEALL On Saturday Daniel called for me at 10a.m and we watched 'Dracula' which I had videoed the previous night.Christopher Lee played Dracula as usual and he was very good.When it was over we went to the field where there were a lot of 'emmets'so we didn't stay long. In the afternoon there was little to do and I was bored,but in the evening we went sea fishing at Talland.I didn't catch anything but I had a bite or two.In the struggle after a bite,I lost my float which made me very cross.We were using frozen sand eels for bait which quickly defrost in the sun. By the time we got home it was 10 o'clock.I watched another T.V programme- 'Give us a Break'-before going to bed.I had had a good day.
